name: enzyme-umd
description: A untility to build a UMD (Universal Module Definition) for Enzyme.
author: Jon Bake

scripts.build: browserify --standalone enzyme-react --out-dir -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment src/enzyme-react.js -o build/enzyme-react.js && uglifyjs build/enzyme-react.js -o build/enzyme-react.min.js
